name: Hexa Crush-Crazy Block
description:
Grandly introduce! Hexa Crush-Crazy Block casual game! It is a brand-new addictive and easy block crush game.
Still playing old-fashioned games like snake, Sudoku, and balls? Stop it! Just try this block crush game! It put casual game and puzzle game all in one. This determines this Hexa Crush-Crazy Block game will definitely become the next addiction! Easy to play, pleasurable for all ages. At the same time, it’s free to download and play. There are also many exquisite props in the game, which can give players better game experience.
HOW TO PLAY
•Drag the blocks to move them.
•Try to fit all the blocks in the frame, and complete the current map.
•Blocks can’t be rotated, adjust the blocks until the whole map covered.
•No time limits. The only target is to complete the map.
FEATURES
•Elaborate designed Retro-kraft image quality.
•Tons of unique levels.
•Smoothing game experience, fantastic game sound and gorgeous visual effects.
•Easy but addictive.
•Free game props as gifts.
•Available on various devices (both Phones and Tablets).
BIG UPDATES
-New lucky wheel. Players can achieve free game props through the lucky wheel. Every player has one lucky wheel chance a day. Good luck for you!
-Brand new chapters! We designed more difficult levels for super players. Finish main levels to unlock branched chapters. Normal levels are too easy for you? Just come and try this. I bet you’ll fall in love with it.
NOTES
•Hexa Crush-Crazy Block is free to play, but it includes in-app purchase for game props.
